String

dump Unicode string

Public Instance Methods

udump() click to toggle source 
# File test.rb, line 6
def udump
  ustr = self.unpack("U*")
  ret = []
  ustr.each do |e|
    if e.is_a?(Integer)
      ret << "U+%04X" % e
    else
      ret << e
    end
  end
  ret
end
